timeline.message:
Merge branch 'feature/payment-congrats' into feature/payment-congrats-response

* feature/payment-congrats:
  removed unused import
  receiptIdList removed
  fix CongratsType
  add PaymentCongratsCurrency
  fix enum congratsType
  javaDoc fixes
  fixes on javaDoc
  javaDoc added!
  implemented parcelable and CongratsType
  basic PaymentCongrats with data form businessPayment

Merge branch 'feature/payment-congrats' into feature/payment-congrats-response

* feature/payment-congrats:
  Create PaymentInfo for PaymentCongrats (#2240)

- added PaymentCongratsResponse to PaymentCongrats
- added builders for PaymentCongratsResponse needed data
- added classes needed to instantiate PaymentCongratsResponse as inner classes
- added logic to create PaymentCongratsResponse in PaymentCongrats when building it

timeline.bodyText: Nik, duda, es necesario que la PaymentCongrats tenga el "paymentCongratsResponse" y todos sus atributos al mismo tiempo? No puede simplemente tener el "paymentCongratsResponse" y que el builder sea el que tenga los atributos sueltos? así cómo el currency digamos
timeline.author: mmunozpatinomeli

replies.bodyText: 100% lo cree como todo lo demas y no me puse a pensar q no son necesarios en el PaymentCongratsResponse en si mismo
replies.author: nmanuelidesML

timeline.bodyText: Perdón no lo ví antes, conarats?? jajajaja
timeline.author: mmunozpatinomeli

replies.bodyText: jajajja, fijate q lo peor es q fue un intento de corregir un typo preexistente "congarts" jajaja
replies.author: nmanuelidesML

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/px-checkout/src/main/java/com/mercadopago/android/px/internal/features/payment_congrats/PaymentCongrats.java b/px-checkout/src/main/java/com/mercadopago/android/px/internal/features/payment_congrats/PaymentCongrats.java
index 00734cf18..92b6febe4 100644
--- a/px-checkout/src/main/java/com/mercadopago/android/px/internal/features/payment_congrats/PaymentCongrats.java
+++ b/px-checkout/src/main/java/com/mercadopago/android/px/internal/features/payment_congrats/PaymentCongrats.java

@@ -309,7 +309,7 @@ public class PaymentCongrats implements Parcelable {
         }
 
         /**
-         * Sets up the image in conarats's header
+         * Sets up the image in congrats's header
          *
          * @param imageUrl url for the header's image
          * @return builder
